page.title: 16NETTLESTONE CAMP SITE
page.content: The camp site is situated in a pleasant area near the sea.{Seagrove {Bay}is easily accessible by following a footpath through picturesque fields. The camp site itself is contained in a large field with excellent facilities. There are about{20 small {tents}which can easily sleep 6 children,{a large marquee}and a {smaller one,}both of which can be used for eating or working in. There are large blocks of{toilets with adequate washing facilities. A {wooden store shed}houses mattresses and blankets. The{kitchen}is also wooden, and there are numerous ovens and plenty of cooking utensils available. Nearby a smaller shed houses a{refrigerator. The site is in fact owned by {Buckinghamshire County Council,}who kindly allow other groups to use it.
